mapper.select: SELECT parent.*, son.menu_id AS sonId, son.menu_name AS sonName, son.icon_cls AS sonIconCls, son.url AS sonUrl, son.parent_id AS sonParentId FROM ( SELECT m.* FROM menu m, role_menu r WHERE m.menu_id = r.menu_id AND r.role_id = #{roleId} AND m.`enable` = TRUE AND m.parent_id IS NULL ORDER BY m.sort ) parent LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.* FROM menu m, role_menu r WHERE m.menu_id = r.menu_id AND r.role_id = #{roleId} AND m.`enable` = TRUE AND m.parent_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY m.sort ) son ON son.parent_id = parent.menu_id
